## Categorical Variables

```{r, eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
mydataCategorical <- mydata %>% 
    select(-Yas,
           -TumorCapi,
           -CerrahiTarih,
           -genel_sagkalim,
           -SonTarih,
           -TNM
    )
```
